Name: Sylvan Warden
Story Background: Deep in the heart of the ancient forest, the Sylvan Warden protects the balance of nature.
Ability: When Sylvan Warden enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
Appearance Description: The Sylvan Warden is a tall, slender elf adorned with intricate green and gold robes, crowned with a wreath of autumn leaves and wielding a staff entwined with vines and glowing with divine energy.
